bibl.title: The Greek Baths in the Fayum at Euhemeria and Theadelphia: A Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: Publishes four bathing facilities at Euhemeria and Theadelphia. All are of the so-called tholos-type and may date to the early period of the settlement. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Greek Baths and Bathing Culture. New Discoveries and Approaches

bibl.seg: Cornelia Römer, The Greek Baths in the Fayum at Euhemeria and Theadelphia: A Preliminary Report.

Sandra K. Lucore & Monika Trümper (edd.), Greek Baths and Bathing Culture. New Discoveries and Approaches = BABesch. Annual Papers on Mediterranean Archaeology. Supplement 23 - 2012 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2013) pp. 229-238, 17 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Publishes four bathing facilities at Euhemeria and Theadelphia. All are of the so-called tholos-type and may date to the early period of the settlement. - Avec résumé en anglais.
